items.content_html: Lumen Dashboard is a lightweight data visualization platform using the Lumen micro-framework. It provides real-time insights through customizable widgets and responsive design for desktop and mobile. With RESTful API integration, it enables efficient monitoring of system activities, empowering users to make informed decisions.
items.title: MrTG1B/Lumen_Dashboard: Lumen Dashboard is a lightweight data visualization platform using the Lumen micro-framework. It provides real-time insights through customizable widgets and responsive design for desktop and mobile. With RESTful API integration, it enables efficient monitoring of system activities, empowering users to make informed decisions.

items.content_html: File Context Builder is a lightweight, configurable TypeScript library that gathers and renders your project’s code file context—including metadata and content—into structured outputs for LLM prompts, dynamic agent workflows, and advanced change reporting.
items.title: 7SigmaLLC/file-context-builder: File Context Builder is a lightweight, configurable TypeScript library that gathers and renders your project’s code file context—including metadata and content—into structured outputs for LLM prompts, dynamic agent workflows, and advanced change reporting.

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight weather application that allows users to check the current weather for any city. The app fetches real-time weather data from the OpenWeather API and displays temperature and weather conditions.
items.title: namansinghr/Weather-app: A simple and lightweight weather application that allows users to check the current weather for any city. The app fetches real-time weather data from the OpenWeather API and displays temperature and weather conditions.

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight To-Do List app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This app uses local storage to save tasks, ensuring they persist even after refreshing the page. Easily add, edit, and delete tasks with a clean and responsive UI. 🚀
items.title: namansinghr/ToDo-LocalStorage: A simple and lightweight To-Do List app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This app uses local storage to save tasks, ensuring they persist even after refreshing the page. Easily add, edit, and delete tasks with a clean and responsive UI. 🚀
